item.title: @elonmusk: A friend told me that now that they've had a child, her husband can't bear to watch movies in which ...
item.description: A friend told me that now that they've had a child, her husband can't bear to watch movies in which bad things happen to kids. Same here. That was one of the most surprising things about having children. You're not just protective of your own children, but children in general.

item.title: @elonmusk: “Doctors are acting like they’re God when it comes to medically transitioning children” That’s from ...
item.description: “Doctors are acting like they’re God when it comes to medically transitioning children” That’s from Jamie Reed, a former gender care patient intake specialist She says the practices she witnessed were disturbing and dangerous

item.title: @elonmusk: Every pound you lose takes 4 pounds of pressure off your knees and 6 pounds off your hips. A 5% redu...
item.description: Every pound you lose takes 4 pounds of pressure off your knees and 6 pounds off your hips. A 5% reduction in body weight can result in a 50% reduction in joint pain. Many people think they have knee or hip issues when it's a weight issue.

item.title: @elonmusk: President Trump: “You want to have voter ID. You must insist on it. California they don’t have voter...
item.description: President Trump: “You want to have voter ID. You must insist on it. California they don’t have voter ID. If an official asks someone for voter ID, they get thrown in jail.”

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: "You’re seeing 700% increases in illegals in swing states over the last three years. When elec...
item.description: ELON: "You’re seeing 700% increases in illegals in swing states over the last three years. When elections are won by 10,000 votes and you bring in 200,000 people on a fast track to citizenship, there will be no more swing states They’re importing voters. It’s becoming a one-party rule like California and if you have one-party rule, that’s not democracy."
